name: crm-ai-assistant
description: AI-powered CRM assistant with deal analysis, insights, and chat interface
postMessage: Set ASSISTANT_API_KEY and ASSISTANT_API_URL env vars. Import: import { AssistantChat, analyzeDealRisks } from './src/modules/crm-ai-assistant'; <AssistantChat deals={deals} config={{ apiEndpoint: '/api/assistant' }} />
